## Import file from GitHub

## Call libraries
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
url <- 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/gnunez2020/tidyverse/main/hotels.csv'
hotels <- read_csv(url)
names(hotels)
```

### Summary of Variables
```{r}
glimpse(hotels)
```

## Select Commands

```{r}
select(hotels, lead_time)
```

```{r}
hotels %>%
  select(hotel, lead_time) %>%
  arrange(desc(lead_time))
```
